name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A dashcam video from the night of May 9 confirmed that the traffic lights on the section of the road where the Nantong bus accident occurred had malfunctioned the night before. The straight signal light did not light up when it was red.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Nantong bus accident on May 10, the entire city of Nantong inspected traffic lights overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, in Zhuhai, Guangdong, a taxi driver was hacked to death by a passenger in the front passenger seat while waiting for a red light. The reason is currently unknown. The hacker then fled the scene with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many villagers in Liuyuan Village, Lvwang Town, Dawu County, Xiaogan City, Hubei Province, found that business licenses were registered in their own and their family's names, and then cancelled inexplicably. From 2011 to 2024, more than 100 people in the village were registered. What is strange is that some companies have been registered for more than ten years, and the annual reports are filled out every year. The audit is normal. I don't know who secretly registered these licenses behind the scenes.
The villagers said that they reported the situation to the town, but no one said who registered it, but only said that they would help cancel it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a full-time teacher from the School of Surveying and Mapping Science and Technology of Xi'an University of Science and Technology reported that a parent asked him to modify the student's grades on the grounds of "affecting the child's future and causing a stain" and verbally threatened the teacher. The relevant personnel of the school also mentioned many times that the parent "had a background" to ask the teacher to modify the grades.
In addition, the teacher also reported that in order to modify the grades of another student who was taking a make-up exam, the school transferred the course grade entry authority from the system without the knowledge of the teacher, and other teachers modified the unqualified grades to qualified scores.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that currently any content related to Nantong buses posted on Douyin will be censored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 10, Jieyang, Guangdong. Villagers of Houpu Village protested against the increase in electricity charges at the village party and mass service center.
The villagers said that the village had volunteered to help the government build the reservoir, and there was a contract between the village and the government to provide benefits to the villagers. After several power reforms, the price became 30 cents. Now that the Southern Power Grid has moved in, the price has increased to 68 cents, which is unacceptable to everyone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, citizens went to the scene of the Nantong bus accident to lay flowers, but the flowers were taken away shortly after they left.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Although Weibo deliberately lowered its weight, netizens have been trying to keep the popularity of Nantong bus related topics at around 13th place. However, the topic has just cooled down further. Currently, on the real-time discussion page, people are expressing their doubts angrily every moment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Cover your mouth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
You guys are still bombarding my mailbox with navy now. It’s useless now.
I don’t even need to contribute, and people don’t need to circumvent the firewall
Because all the discussions about Nantong buses have been carried out directly inside the wall every moment.
If you are really scared, maybe you can try to block it completely like the Xinjiang fire.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Several videos of the mother of the girl who died in the Nantong bus accident have been taken down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 10, in Zigong, Sichuan, an elderly man jumped off a building because he did not want to burden his family, possibly because of Alzheimer's disease.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 10, Guangdong, the property management of Qiankeng New Village did not allow electric vehicles and motorcycles to enter the community, which caused dissatisfaction among the owners. That night, three owners dismantled the gate with their bare hands, which caused everyone to applaud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, Caixin magazine published a special article titled "The Tragedy of Meida Expressway", which provided an in-depth analysis of the incident. However, the article was blocked shortly after it was published.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of May 11, Pingxiang, Jiangxi. According to local villagers, Shangli County planned to build a reservoir in Liuyuan Village 3 due to insufficient water supply. However, the government's compensation for demolition was far below the national standard, and the government forcibly occupied the villagers' houses and land. In the evening, the government summoned social personnel and police to beat the villagers. Some villagers were injured in the conflict and were hospitalized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 10, Zaozhuang, Shandong. Dongyi Risheng Smart Home Technology (Zaozhuang) Co., Ltd. owed employees wages, and employees collectively petitioned to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 11, Shahe City, Hebei Province. Kaixuan City Linhu Yipin real estate project was left unfinished, and owners went to the local petition office to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 11, the Nantong Municipal Education Bureau mentioned that it had set up a "one-person-one-special team" to comfort the children and their families and deal with the aftermath.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 10, Heze, Shandong. The construction of Country Garden Peak Phase II was suspended, and the supervision funds were suspected to be misappropriated by the developer. The owners put up banners to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens took photos of the Nantong bus accident, in which the government urgently blocked the scene to repair the traffic lights. The special police on the scene smiled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Voice of the people: 
Under the news that "a little girl died in the Nantong bus accident due to ineffective rescue", the comment section was full of curses, demanding that the government tell the truth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 10, a traffic law enforcement officer in Honghe Hani and Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Yunnan Province, was involved in a scam.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
5 minutes ago, Sina quoted Xinhua News Agency news
The Nantong bus accident caused 1 death, 1 serious injury, and 6 minor or light injuries.
The accident was initially investigated and it was admitted that the bus driver did not carefully observe the intersection due to the failure of the straight signal light, and collided with the dump truck.
The dump truck involved was suspected of violating regulations and driving in the restricted area. The dump truck driver has been controlled.
